summary.span: 針對做為 XHTML 配接器集目標的裝置提供文字寫入器功能，包括可延伸超文字標記語言 (XHTML)、XHTML Mobile 和無線標記語言 (WML)。

span.span: Provides text writer functionality for devices targeted by the XHTML adapter set, including Extensible Hypertext Markup Language (XHTML), XHTML Mobile, and Wireless Markup Language (WML).

summary.span: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱 Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET (使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站)。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks XHTML 是 HTML 4.1 為基礎，並可讓您建立網站適用於多個裝置類型符合 XML 標記。XHTML is an XML-compliant markup that is based on HTML 4.1 and allows you to create Web sites suitable for multiple device types. 它會合併 HTML 的便利性與 XML 的嚴格的項目指導方針，以產生的標記語言，使用各種不同的格式和樣式選項，並且降低標記標籤模稜兩可。It merges HTML's ease of use with XML's strict element guidelines to produce a markup language with a wide range of format and style options and reduced markup tag ambiguity. 這個類別提供格式化功能，讓 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項使用用戶端呈現 XHTML 內容時。This class provides formatting capabilities that ASP.NET server controls use when rendering XHTML content to clients. 呈現的標記符合三個不同的 XHTML 文件類型的標準： XHTML Basic 時，它支援有限的樣式和格式項目;XHTML Mobile Profile 支援內嵌樣式表;與 WML 2.0 時，它以 XHTML 1.1 為基礎，並支援階層式樣式表。The renders markup that meets the standards of three different XHTML doc types: XHTML Basic, which supports limited style and format elements; XHTML Mobile Profile, which supports inline style sheets; and WML 2.0, which is based on XHTML 1.1 and supports cascading style sheets. 這個類別主要供行動裝置的自訂頁面和控制項配接器的開發人員。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters. 類別可以呈現所有 HTML 元素、 屬性和樣式屬性，但，不同於類別中，不允許這些標記項目的標題大小寫。The class can render all HTML elements, attributes, and style attributes, but, unlike the class, does not allow title capitalization of these markup elements. 具現化並根據目標裝置的功能，初始化數個屬性，例如， ，和，協助在呈現頁面的文字寫入器並將其控制項。An instantiates an and depending on the capabilities of the target device, initializes a number of properties, such as , , and , that assist the text writer in rendering the page and its controls. 您的配接器可以使用各種方法來套用樣式和控制格式設定：Your adapter can use a variety of methods to apply styles and control formatting: - 和， and , - 和，及 and , and - 和 。 and . > [!NOTE] > 這個類別衍生自類別，又衍生自這些基底類別提供類別，還有它的功能。This class derives from the class, which in turn derives from the class, and much of its functionality is provided by these base classes. 您可以使用這個類別的成員以及它所繼承的任何成員類別，以建立用於自訂的 XHTML 頁面或類別配接器中的自訂文字寫入器。You can use the members of this class, and any members it inherits from the class, to create custom text writers to use in a custom XHTML page or in class adapters. 您也可以建立新的衍生的類別覆寫的標準行為類別。You can also create new derived classes that override the standard behavior of the class. 若要使用的伺服器控制項的特定配接器或文字寫入器需要裝置篩選。Device filtering is required in order to use a specific adapter or text writer for a server control. 如需有關裝置篩選的詳細資訊，請參閱[架構概觀的自動調整控制項行為](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff)並[裝置篩選概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19)。For more information about device filtering, see [Architectural Overview of Adaptive Control Behavior](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4ff05ae9-4109-4352-929e-ad893895dbff) and [Device Filtering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bdfeaa58-dedd-4c0d-8610-988aac0eff19).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文字寫入器會相對應的頁面配置器為特定的目標裝置，來具現化並再由頁面配置器和配接器的每個頁面上的控制項。Text writers are instantiated by a corresponding page adapter for a specific target device, and then used by the page adapter and the adapters for each control on the page. 這個類別主要供行動裝置的自訂頁面和控制項配接器的開發人員。This class is used primarily by developers of custom mobile page and control adapters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數和 URL 值的名稱會編碼、 和等號 （=） 括號之間插入。Both the name of the parameter and the URL value are encoded, and an equal sign (=) is inserted between them. 中的空間`name`或`value`字串會編碼為加號 （+）、 和等號 （=） 會編碼為 %3d。Spaces in the `name` or `value` strings are encoded as plus signs (+), and equal signs (=) are encoded as %3d.
